original_text: I tell you this. When God judges everyone, he will punish the people from Sodom. But he will punish you people much more!’
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 이르노니 심판 날에 소돔 땅이 너보다 견디기 쉬우리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: he will punish the people from Sodom.
But he will punish you people much more!'
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 너희 사람들을 훨씬 더 벌하실 것이다!'
